mapper.insert: insert into Resource (`code`, parentCode, `name`, url, sort, type, isShow, createTime) values (#{code}, #{parentCode}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{isShow}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select id, `code`, parentCode, `name`, sort, type, isShow from Resource
`code` like concat(#{code},'%') and
parentCode like concat(#{parentCode},'%') and
`name` like concat(#{name},'%') and
sort = #{sort} and
type = #{type} and
isShow = #{isShow} and
select `code`, parentCode, `name`, url, type, sort from Resource where type in (1, 2) and isShow = 1 order by `sort` desc
